Description: 3 joining fragments from rim of pottery mortarium. Light yellow-beige clay, relatively dense and hard. Graffito on inside of lip: ]τωπολλωσο[ retrograde.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 61, pl. XXXII, no. 68)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 645, no. 29, pl. 19.1.7)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (no. 3)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.13)
